import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './appform.css'; // This file will contain the necessary CSS import Footer from './footer'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { MapContainer, TileLayer, Marker, Popup, useMapEvents } from 'react-leaflet'; import 'leaflet/dist/leaflet.css'; import Modal from 'react-modal'; import L from 'leaflet'; const icon = L.icon({ iconUrl: 'src/to/pin.jpg', // Provide your custom marker icon path here iconSize: [25, 41], iconAnchor: [12, 41], popupAnchor: [0, -41], }); const LocationPin = ({ onLocationSelect }) => { useMapEvents({ click(e) { const { lat, lng } = e?.latlng || {}; if (lat !== undefined && lng !== undefined) { onLocationSelect([lat, lng]); } else { console.error("Error: Location data is undefined."); } } }); return null; }; const Appform = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isMapVisible, setIsMapVisible] = useState(false); const [location, setLocation] = useState(null); const [newRe, setNewRe] = useState(""); const [branch, setBranch] = useState("Tibanga-Main"); const [applicationDate, setApplicationDate] = useState(""); const handleFileChange = (event, setState) => { const { files } = event.target; setState(files[0]); }; const handleCheckboxChange = (event, setState, currentState) => { const { value, checked } = event.target; if (checked) { setState([...currentState, value]); // Add to state } else { setState(currentState.filter((item) => item !== value)); // Remove from state } }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (!branch || !applicationDate || !newRe) { // Create a custom error message that includes the values const missingFields = []; if (!branch) missingFields.push("Branch"); if (!applicationDate) missingFields.push("Application Date"); if (!newRe) missingFields.push("Application Type"); // Join the missing fields into a string and display them in the alert alert(`All fields are required! Missing: ${missingFields.join(', ')}`); return; } const requestData = { branch, applicationDate, newRe }; console.log('Submitting data:', requestData); // Log for debugging try { const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/loan', requestData); if (response.status === 201) { alert(response.data.message); navigate('/'); } else { alert('Something went wrong.'); } } catch (error) { console.error('Error submitting loan:', error.response?.data || error.message); alert(error.response?.data?.error || 'Error submitting loan. Please check your input.'); } }; const handleLocationSelect = (selectedLocation) => { setLocation(selectedLocation); // Store selected location setIsMapVisible(false); // Optionally close the map after selection }; const showMap = () => { setIsMapVisible(true); // show map when called }; return (
{/* Header Section */}

MSU-IIT National Multi-Purpose Cooperative

{/* Form Container */}

Loan Application Form

setApplicationDate(e.target.value)} />
setApplicantName(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setEmailAddress(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setTelMob(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setAge(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setSpouseName(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setSpouseOccu(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
{isMapVisible && (

Select a location on the map.

)}
{/* Modal for Map with Pin */} setIsMapVisible(false)} contentLabel="Select Residence Location" className="map-modal" overlayClassName="map-modal-overlay" > {/* Pin marker when user clicks */} {location && ( Selected Location:
Latitude: {location[0]}
Longitude: {location[1]} )}
setLoanAmount(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setLoanTerm(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setEmployer(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setEmpCon(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setEmpStatus(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setBusinessName(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setBusinessAdd(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setLengthMem(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
setShareCapital(e.target.value)} // Update state required /> setSavingsDepo(e.target.value)} // Update state required /> setOtherDepo(e.target.value)} // Update state required />
); }; export default Appform;
